description: Responsible for front-end development, enhancing app functionality, and optimizing performance, contributing to enriching student experiences and ensuring a seamless educational journey.
Led frontend development efforts at Auctopus Technologies, integrating new features, optimizing performance, and ensuring robust architecture for a comprehensive networking application.
Technical content writer for Framed Media, creating engaging and informative content for a variety of clients, including blog posts, and articles.
Crafted engaging content centered on Hindu Mythology, Indian History, and Indian Culture, weaving narratives that captivated audiences.
